game.name: Litter Factory
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Litter Factory is a fast-paced co-op sim where you and a friend become Waste Warriors, cleaning the world one trash at a time! Collect, sort, and recycle waste into resources while dealing with problems such as electricity shortage and malfunctioning machines.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Litter Factory is a fast-paced co-op sim where you and a friend become Waste Warriors, cleaning the world one trash at a time! Collect, sort, and recycle waste into resources while dealing with problems such as electricity shortage and malfunctioning machines.
